item.description:
Great Meadow Conservation Trust guided walk at the Hockanum Meadows in East Hartford. Meet at Hockanum Park, High Street, East Hartford. There will be no Hartford Hiking Meetup leadership at this event, just mingle with the other walkers and enjoy.

Since there is no Hartford Hiking Meetup leadership involved in this event, questions will have to be directed to Great Meadow Conservation Trust

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: Guided Nature Hike
